article_title: After closing medical clinic, NIP works to keep mental health and other services going

article_metadata.description: Since 1968, the Minneapolis-based Neighborhood Involvement Program (NIP) has provided a range of free or low-cost health care and other support services to thousands of uninsured clients in the Twin Cities.

og.description: Dental, senior and youth services are among others that the Neighborhood Involvement Program is struggling to maintain.
og.title: After closing medical clinic, NIP works to keep mental health and other services going
